titleStmt.title: The boke of Magna Carta with diuers other statutes, whose names appere in the nexte lefe folowynge, translated into Englyshe.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England.
Ferrers, George, 1500?-1579.
England.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, by me Robert Redman, dwellyng at the sygne of the George, nexte to Saynt Dunstones church],

notesStmt.note: Translated by George Ferrers, whose name appears on the colophon leaf.
Includes the text of part 1 of STC 9271 only.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
